op.title: Share Your Halloween Costume Ideas
op.body:
Hey all! It's dat time of the year again!!

Me and meh bf (boyfriend) are going as the Mistress of Mystery and Grognak this time!!

I'm excited to hear your cr@zy ideaz and what ur planning on dressing up as!!

replies.body:
Oh my god
who the hell cares
I'm going as a burned guy
